I’m kind of obsessed with maximizing time lately, especially after my dear friend Mags passed away..

Just a short blog on how grateful I am despite the risks I took for the past years. I am able to recover from adversities, have a bed to sleep, a computer to write this blog and review how 2019 was and a smartphone to make amazing sketches about my brain ticks. All of my cup of time were poured to learning and non-stop cycling. Health is at peak. Resources growing. Nothing to complain really. That is why I consider this the best year of my waking time in the pale blue dot.

I have built habits in 2019 that will enable me a better platform to tackling bigger challenges in the comming year 2020. I believe 2020 will be a bigger year in itself. More opportunities to create stories, art and blogs. I’m dedicating a lot of time now to learn more code now like I used to in 2018. Yeah, very optimistic for the coming year…pretty excited.

I just have to focus on doing the essential - the choices that enables me to make more choices. This will be an ongoing layer of frame of viewing my actions. I want to use 2020 to analyze what I can improve more and invest more effort, resources and time to cultivate it. Got to get better with pistol shooting…
